title: Lucy Hale enjoys a day off from filming Katy Keene
text:
She's in the middle of filming her new show Katy Keene.

But Lucy Hale took a break from the set on Saturday as she was seen leaving a coffee shop in NYC with her mother Julie.

The 30-year-old actress cut a chic figure in a black motorcycle jacket and distressed jeans with a high waist.

Casual: Lucy Hale took a break from the set on Saturday as she was seen leaving a coffee shop in NYC with her mother Julie

She also wore a brown mock-neck blouse under her jacket and navigated the sidewalk in Chelsea boots.

The Pretty Little Liars star shaded her vision in a pair of gold-rimmed sunglasses with a circular shape.

Her sighting comes a few weeks after she opened up to Elite Daily at the Tribeca Film Festival on Katy Keene.

Out-and-about: The 30-year-old actress cut a chic figure in a black motorcycle jacket and distressed jeans with a high waist

'It just leaves you feeling so optimistic about life and whatever dreams and goals you have,' she told the outlet.

'Each of the characters of the show has a specific endgame, end goal, dream.'

She also expressed a soft spot for the show because she sees a bit of herself in the character she plays.

Busy: She also wore a brown mock-neck blouse under her jacket and navigated the sidewalk in Chelsea boots

'I moved to LA at a really young age with my mom. For a while, [I was] trying to become an actor and just auditioning, hearing "no" all the time, and so I see this struggle,' she explained.

'I see myself in Katie because I’ve been there … I know what she’s going through and our stories are so similar. It’s so cool to tap into that,' she said.

Katy Keene is set to premiere in 2020.
description: She's in the middle of filming her new show Katy Keene. But Lucy Hale took a break from the set on Saturday as she was seen leaving a coffee shop in NYC with her mother Julie.
